    • Method Detail

      • describe

        public void describe()
        Its purpose is to print out the state of the student.

        type void.

      • finishedStudies

        public boolean finishedStudies()
        Its purpose is to check if a student has a book and if the student can borrow any more.

        type boolean.

        Returns:
        True, if both of the conditions are met.

      • study

        public void study()
        Its purpose is to make the student borrow a book if there is none; otherwise check if the book is finished.

        type void. If it is not increase chapters read by one; otherwise return the book back to the library.
